name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Highly skilled Backend Engineer with over 10 years of expertise in **backend architecture**, **APIs**, and **databases**. Proven ability to design and develop **production backends** leveraging **strongly typed languages** like **Python** and **Django**, and adept in both **relational** and **non-relational databases**. Experience in implementing **automated testing** frameworks and utilizing modern **deployment strategies** to enhance system reliability and performance. Familiar with **internet networking concepts**, **containerization**, and security protocols including **public key infrastructure**, **encryption**, **authentication**, and **authorization**. Proficient in **model-based engineering** and **data model design**, utilizing tools such as **UML** for effective system visualization. Demonstrated ability to maintain **system observability**, track **performance metrics**, and conduct **error diagnostics** to ensure top performance. A flexible problem solver with strong communication skills, successfully collaborating across disciplines and adhering to **data residency requirements** and compliance frameworks like **SOC2**, **ISO 27001**, and **IEC62304**. Contributed significantly to high-impact projects for leading organizations, including VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.

Engineered and maintained efficient **data pipelines** using **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions**, ensuring compliance with regulatory data exchange standards and timely data delivery within **2 hours** of collection.
Conducted comprehensive security assessments and integrated **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** to create robust authentication systems adhering to **ISO 27001** and **SOC2** standards.
Facilitated collaboration with cross-functional teams to resolve system integration challenges, ensuring compliance with **IEC62304** for software lifecycle processes and overseeing inclusive release strategies.

• Engaged in comprehensive error diagnostics and performance metrics analysis, resulting in enhanced system observability and response times.
